item.title: Nestle India Joins Market Coverage: Key Investment Merits and Strategic Fit
item.description: Nestle India has been added to the list of stocks under active coverage as of 24 December 2025, reflecting its standing as a large-cap FMCG company with notable financial metrics. This inclusion highlights the company’s stable market position, robust sales figures, and strong cash reserves, making it a significant consideration for investors seeking exposure in the fast-moving consumer goods sector. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Reveal Mixed Trends Across Market Caps with Tata Steel Leading Large Caps
item.description: The September 2025 quarterly results season has unfolded with a nuanced pattern across market capitalisations, reflecting a cautious yet varied corporate performance landscape. Among 4,005 stocks reporting, the proportion of companies registering positive results hovered around 43%, indicating a slight shift compared to previous quarters. Tata Steel emerged prominently among large caps, while mid and small caps displayed divergent outcomes, underscoring sectoral and size-based dynamics in earnings trends. Time: 2 hours ago
